directions.step:
Cook to 295 degrees on candy thermometer, stirring continually over low heat. Pour into buttered pan. Spread 1 pkg of milk chocolate chips or a large Hershey Bar on top and sprinkle with crushed almonds or walnuts. Break into pieces.
Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by vaughndell@juno.com on Dec 8, 1997
